text: Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata no kamigami no naka, dare ga shinri ni michibiku no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Arra wa shinri ni michibiite kudasa reru. Sorede shinri ni michibiku kata to, jibun ga michibika renakereba michi o miidasenai mono to, dochira ga shitagau no ni ataisuru no ka. Anata gata wa do shita no ka. Anata gata wa do handan suru no ka
